thread.title: machu pichu2

title: machu pichu2
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Machu Picchu, famous inca city on top of the mountains, it was never found by Spaniards and stayed intact till today, now it is visited by a lot of people everyday. wikipedia: "It is situated on a mountain ridge above the Sacred Valley which is 80 kilometres (50 mi) northwest of Cuzco and through which the Urubamba River flows. Most archaeologists believe that Machu Picchu was built as an estate for the Inca emperor Pachacuti (1438Â–1472). Often mistakenly referred to as the "Lost City of the Incas", it is the most familiar icon of Inca civilization." 
pajaran has marked this note useful
